New Records: Suryakumar Yadav is set to become the second men's batter to get 1000-plus runs in a calendar year after scoring 935 runs in 2022
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed has taken eight wickets in the Super 12s, including two Player-of-the-Match awards
India struggled against South Africa with key players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli getting out
Pre-Game Insights: India has traditionally dominated Bangladesh, having lost just one T20I against them
Bangladesh's focus is on their bowling and batting improvements, particularly with Taskin Ahmed and Najmul Hossain Shanto
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain is forecast for the evening, potentially affecting the match
Historical comparisons show India has won their only T20I at Adelaide in 2016 and Bangladesh won their only match there in 2015
Others: Probable lineups: India includes KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Deepak Hooda, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Dinesh Karthik, R Ashwin, Mohammed Shami, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Arshdeep Singh; Bangladesh includes Soumya Sarkar, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Litton Das, Shakib Al Hasan, Afif Hossain, Nurul Hasan, Mosaddek Hossain, Yasir Ali, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Hasan Mahmud
